synopsis:
The OVA will tell the childhood stories of the main characters, adapting from the first volume of Satoru Yamaguchi's original light novel.

Bundled with the seventh limited edition volume of the manga.

(Source: MAL News)

title.en: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! OVA
